subject: Football
Retirement
Law and Legislation
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: With emerging evidence about the long-term health hazards of playing professional football, a hearing Monday will shed light on how the disability-benefit process works — or does not work — for retired N.F.L. players.
snippet: With emerging evidence about the long-term health hazards of playing professional football, a hearing Monday will shed light on how the disability-benefit process works — or does not work — for retired N.F.L. players.
